Package com.hr.jtexgen.generator

Class TextChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hr.jtexgen.generator.TextChain
  • public class TextChain
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a Markov chain for a weighted graph of words as the state.
    Author:
    Hasnain Raza

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new text chain.

      • generate

        public java.lang.String generate​(int minimumLength,
                                 int maximumLength)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates text using the internal Markov chain.
        Parameters:
        minimumLength - the minimum length of the generated text.
        maximumLength - the maximum length of the generated text.
        Returns:
        the generated text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given minimum length is less than 1 or greater than the maximum length.

      • merge

        public void merge​(TextChain textChain,
                  double alpha)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Merges the text chain with the given text chain. The alpha value is used to determine how much the final result resemble the weights of the given text chain.
        Parameters:
        textChain - the TextChain to be merged.
        alpha - the alpha value to be used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if text chain is null or alpha is less than or equal to 0 or greater than or equal to 1.
